name: Crystal Clear
overview: Crystal Clear is an expansive, open-world Gen II ROM hack, developed by ShockSlayer. No new moves, stat changes, or species. Gen II as you've always known it, but like you've never played before. Pick your starter, your region, customize your character, and then do whatever you want, in the order you want, in a unique adventure for you You can collect all 16 badges, catch all 251, take on the new E4, re-challenge gyms, visit new places, And discover new story arcs in the region you already know There's a lot of things to do, and a lot of ways to do them.
